pansale andayata gahagena adi gahana ,gihiyantath nogalapena lingika kriyawala yedena , sharuk ban eekon lankawata ena kota parata bahina , parlimenthuwe palath sabhawe deshapalanaya koranta yana , kunu harupa bana kiyana , thaman hada gath eka eka wandim krama( bodhisathwa wandana aadiya ) minissunta purudu karana ,salli walata bana wikunana, eka eka de gana anawaki pala karana( loka winasaya wani ) , igana gannakan witharak siwura dagena indala siwura athharina ,manthara gurukam wikunan kana.....chiwara dharin mekedi wadiyenma wagakiwa yuthu wenawa .

eda 13 wana wyawastha sanshodhanayath in bihi kala palath sabha kramayath eewa bihi wu deshapalana sandarbhaya amathaka kara wiyukthawa gena wigraha kirimata yama nirarthaka karyaki.rajiw-je.aar giwisuma athsan karana wita lanka aanduwa amarikan thurule hurathal wi ehi aanisansa lesa indiya deshapalana udahasata lakwa hembathwi thibina.munichchawata athata atha di athsan kalada meya bellata thuwakkuwa thaba je.aarge atha kara kawa balahathkarayen ekanga karawagath apuruwa ewaka shri lankawe indiya maha komasaris diksithge 'kolambaa bhumikawa' granthaye manawin sandahanya.kese ho apata mehidi wadagath wanne indu lanka giwisumata ada athi walangubhawayayi .giwisume 2.9 waganthiyata anuwa palath sabha wisanduma laba denne indiya hamuda madihathwimen eltitieeya saha anekuth sannaddha kandayam nirayudha kirimen pasuwaya.

shri lankawa menma wenath boho ratawala da gatum aarawul wisada ganimata bhawitha karana pradhana kramawedaya wana adhikarana kramawedaya thula pudgalaya muhuna dena abhiyoga apahasutha rasakata wisadumak menma gatum nirakaranayata athi ekama wisaduma usawi kramaya lesin salakanu labana sampradayika mathayata wikalpayak lesin bhawitha kala haki karyakshama ha paladayi kramawedayak lesin samathakaranaya samajagatha kirimata hakiyawa mema danuwath kirim thulin labena bawa samatha mandala komishan sabhawa pawasayi.
